heroHeadline: Fluxonaut is a hyper customizable real-time information aggregator
heroSubheadline: Understand the flow, be in the know, streamline and speed up the way you consume information.
featuresAggregateBody:
All the best of the Internet, **in the same place**, as it happens.

Whether you want to read content published by your favourite websites or blogs, follow Twitter feeds or market data fluctuations, watch YouTube videos or Twitch streams, you can get all of that (and even more) in a single place â€“ your Fluxonaut dashboard.
